objects.description: Pegasus for Android listens for the BOOT_COMPLETED broadcast intent in order to maintain persistence and activate its functionality at device boot time.

external_references.description: Mike Murray. (2017, April 3). Pegasus for Android: the other side of the story emerges. Retrieved April 16, 2017.

objects.x_mitre_detection: {{LinkById|MOB-S0032}} listens for the BOOT_COMPLETED broadcast intent in order to maintain persistence and activate its functionality at device boot time.
